help_intro: Find answers to common questions or contact our support team.
help_q1: How can I create a FlexGigs account?
help_a1: You can easily register on the homepage by clicking 'Create Account'.
help_q2: Can I change the platform language?
help_a2: Yes, select your preferred language from the top-right dropdown menu.
help_q3: Where can I contact technical support?
help_a3: Send us an email at support@flexgigs.com and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
